Challenges

A library to assist programming, testing and execution of solutions for coding challenges like those on stepik.org

  • Version: 0.7

  • Release: 0.7.0

    • Installation
      • Clone from Github
        • Put your challenges immediately into the projects folder
      • Use <pip> to install <challenges>
